title: About
text:
Iâ€™m studying Statistics and Data Science at UCLA and am pursuing a career in esports. Most recently, I worked on Apex Legends Esports tracking data analytics, producing content, covering socials, and coordinating partnerships. However, Iâ€™ve worked extensively in freelance video production for clients like Raidiant, Monkey Bubble, and Washington Justice (OWL) and interning for organizations like Counter Logic Gaming (LCS/FGC) and Philadelphia Fusion (OWL).
